11#include "modules/audio_coding/codecs/pcm16b/audio_encoder_pcm16b.h"
12
13#include "modules/audio_coding/codecs/pcm16b/pcm16b.h"
14#include "rtc_base/checks.h"
15
16namespace webrtc {
17
18size_t AudioEncoderPcm16B::EncodeCall(const int16_t* audio,
19 size_t input_len,
20 uint8_t* encoded) {
21 return WebRtcPcm16b_Encode(audio, input_len, encoded);
22}
23
24size_t AudioEncoderPcm16B::BytesPerSample() const {
25 return 2;
26}
27
28AudioEncoder::CodecType AudioEncoderPcm16B::GetCodecType() const {
29 return CodecType::kOther;
30}
31
32bool AudioEncoderPcm16B::Config::IsOk() const {
33 if ((sample_rate_hz != 8000) && (sample_rate_hz != 16000) &&
34 (sample_rate_hz != 32000) && (sample_rate_hz != 48000))
35 return false;
36 return AudioEncoderPcm::Config::IsOk();
37}
38
39} // namespace webrtc
40
